text: Tadashiku tsukaeru to iu koto wa, anata gata no kao o azuma matawa nishi ni mukeru kotode wanai. Tsumari tadashiku tsukaeru to wa, arrā to saigo no (shinpan no) Ni~Tsu, tenshi-tachi, sho Keisuke to yogen-sha-tachi o shinji, kare o aisuru tame ni sono zaisan o, kinshin, minashigo, hinja, tabiji ni aru mono ya monogoi ya dorei no kaihō no tame ni tsuiyashi, reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o okonai, yakusoku shita toki wa sono yakusoku o hatashi, mata konku to gyakkyō to hijōji ni saishite wa, yoku taeshinobu mono. Korera koso shinjitsuna monodeari, mata korera koso omo o osoreru monodearu
